des:
The Vivitar 4 Lights Alexa skill allows you to easily control your Vivitar smart home outlets using Alexa voice commands.

Here’s a step by step guide for setting up this Skill:
1. Open the Vivitar Smart Home Security app for Android or iOS.
2. Make sure that you created an account (Group 4) and completed the setup for your Vivitar Smart Outlets using the Vivitar Smart Home Security app.
3. Connect the Vivitar smart home device to the same Wi-Fi network as your Alexa device.
4. Download the Amazon Alexa app on your mobile device.

Discovering the Vivitar smart home devices with a skill
1. You can connect the Vivitar smart home device using the Alexa app.
2. Open the Alexa app, go to the menu, and then select Skills.
3. Search and find the Vivitar 4 Lights skill for your device, then select Enable.
4. Follow the on-screen instructions to complete the linking process.
5. Ask Alexa to discover your device. Say, “Alexa, discover my devices,” or select Add Device in the Smart Home section of the Alexa app.
6. Your discovered Vivitar outlets are listed under the Smart Home section of the Alexa app.
7. You are now ready to control them via Alexa’s voice commands.

Supported voice commands:
“Alexa, turn on office outlet”
“Alexa, turn off office outlet”
